SELECT diaries.content, diaries.created_time, diaries.update_time, tags.tag_name,diaries.id FROM diaries LEFT JOIN diary_tags ON diaries.id = diary_tags.diary_id LEFT JOIN tags ON tags.id = diary_tags.tag_id
AND diaries.user_id=#{userId} ANd diaries.status=0
AND tags.tag_name LIKE concat('%', #{tagName}, '%')
AND diaries.content LIKE concat('%', #{content}, '%')
AND diaries.update_time BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} order by diaries.update_time DESC
